actions.name: Natural Cure

cost.trigger: The user is switched out or combat ends while the user is not @Affliction[fainted].

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is switched out or combat ends while the user is not @Affliction[fainted].
Effect: The user is cured of all Major Status Afflictions affecting them.

system.description:
Trigger: The user is switched out or combat ends while the user is not @Affliction[fainted].
Effect: The user is cured of all Major Status Afflictions affecting them.
